query.statement: SELECT BS101_GNM, BS101_SPT, BS101_TEL, BS101_AD1, BS101_AD2, BS101_QTY, DOUBLE(BS101_EAM) BS101_EAM, BS101_PID, VALUE((SELECT MM028.CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028 WHERE MM028.MANDT = BS101.MANDT AND MM028.CODE1 = 'BS103' AND MM028.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028.CODE2 = BS101.BS101_JRT),'') AS BS101_JRT, VALUE((SELECT MM028.CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028 WHERE MM028.MANDT = BS101.MANDT AND MM028.CODE1 = 'BS101' AND MM028.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028.CODE2 = BS101.BS101_PST),'') AS BS101_PST, VALUE((SELECT MM028.CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028 WHERE MM028.MANDT = BS101.MANDT AND MM028.CODE1 = 'BS112' AND MM028.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028.CODE2 = BS101.BS101_NCD),'') AS BS101_NCD, BS101_AYM||'-'||BS101_ASQ BS101_NO, BS101_ADT, VALUE(BS103.BS103_GDT,'00000000') BS103_GDT, (SELECT UF.USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF UF WHERE UF.MANDT = BS101.MANDT AND UF.USERNUMB = BS101.BS101_CID) BS101_CID, (SELECT M28.CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE M28 WHERE M28.MANDT = BS101.MANDT AND M28.CODE1 = 'CS131' AND M28.LANG = #G_LANG# AND M28.CODE2 = BS101.BS101_GBN) AS BS101_GBN, VALUE((SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS M WHERE M.MANDT = BS101.MANDT AND M.CODE1 = 'BS106' AND M.LANG = #G_LANG# AND M.CODE2 = BS103_COMA),'') AS BS103_COMA FROM SAPHEE.ZBST101 BS101 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZBST103 AS BS103 ON BS103.MANDT = BS101.MANDT AND BS103_AYM = BS101_AYM AND BS103_ASQ = BS101_ASQ WHERE BS101.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND ((BS101.BS101_CDT BETWEEN TRIM(CHAR(INT(SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4))-1))||TRIM(SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),5,4)) AND HEX(CURRENT DATE)) OR (VALUE(BS103.BS103_GDT,'00000000') BETWEEN TRIM(CHAR(INT(SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4))-1))||TRIM(SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),5,4)) AND HEX(CURRENT DATE))) AND BS101.BS101_GNM LIKE '%'||#GNM#||'%' AND BS101.BS101_SPT LIKE '%'||#SPT#||'%' --AND replace(replace(BS101.BS101_TEL,'-',''),')','') LIKE '%'||#TEL#||'%' --AND BS101.BS101_AD1 LIKE '%'||#AD1#||'%' AND BS101.BS101_PST = '30' WITH UR
